page.title: 11A Chelmsford Parish Priest
page.content: We have been examining the{daily {life and work}of our local priest. He is{vicar}of a very{modern church}in the middle of a{large housing estate. His day often starts with a{short ser- {vice}at{06:45}followed by a period of study. After breakfast the rest of the morning is spent in{church matters. After lunch he{visits}the{sick}and the {old,}to pray with them and to help and advise them. As a priest he{cannot {just be Christian}while he is{at work. He says that you need to be a very {"calm sort of person"}to do the job. He comes into our school weekly to talk to us. He thinks this is a very important part of his work because it is often the only contact children have with the church. It seems to us that a{priest}must be a{very special kind of{person}and so is a very {valuable member}of{any community.
